channel.title: makeGlobalObject troubles

item.title: makeGlobalObject troubles
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

I need serious help with this, someones gotta know what to do…

Hello, in my code wherever i place makeGlobalObject, it compiles fine, but then doesn’t show up in game. Unless I add it in with my commands code, as such:

public void customCommand(String command) {
		actionAmount++;

command.replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
command.replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
command.trim();



//COMMANDS START


if (command.startsWith("mypos")){
	sendMessage("X: "+absX);
	sendMessage("Y: "+absY);
}

makeGlobalObject(3234, 3224, 0, 2, 10);

//COMMANDS END AFTER THIS THE NEXT "}"
}

with that code after i do my ::mypos command it appears with collision, but before i do the command its not there (no collision either), and anywhere else in my code where i place it it just doesn’t appear at all. Whats up with this?!?
The only time it makes errors is when it’s not inside a public void thingy.

Please help me, this could ruin my RSPS making D:

Read full topic
